\batchmode

\documentclass[a4paper]{book}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% packages %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% package list generated by doxygen -w latex
\usepackage{a4wide}
\usepackage{makeidx}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{listings}
\usepackage{color}
\usepackage{textcomp}
\usepackage{alltt}
\usepackage{times}
\usepackage{ifpdf}
\ifpdf
\usepackage[pdftex,
            pagebackref=true,
            colorlinks=true,
            linkcolor=blue,
            unicode
           ]{hyperref}
\else
\usepackage[ps2pdf,
            pagebackref=true,
            colorlinks=true,
            linkcolor=blue,
            unicode
           ]{hyperref}
\usepackage{pspicture}
\fi
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage{doxygen}

% additional packages
\usepackage{wrapfig}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}

% package options
\lstset{language=C++,
        inputencoding=utf8,
        basicstyle=\footnotesize,
        breaklines=true,
        breakatwhitespace=true,
        tabsize=8,
        numbers=left}
\makeindex
\setcounter{tocdepth}{3}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% custom macros %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% To create wrapped figures, we create a new Doxygen DoxyImage environment
% (replacing the one from doxygen.sty) which uses \wrapfigure. Because we
% can't parse any arguments with Doxygen's \image command, a new alias,
% \wrapfig (defined in doxy-pdf-aliases.cfg) is used to pass the placement,
% width, and label of the figure using the \LSDwrapfig* variables

\def\LSDwrapfig#1#2#3{%
  \def\LSDwrapfigPlace{#1}%
  \def\LSDwrapfigWidth{#2}%
  \def\LSDwrapfigLabel{#3}%
}
\renewenvironment{DoxyImage}{%
  \wrapfigure{\LSDwrapfigPlace}{\LSDwrapfigWidth}%
  \center%
}{%
  \label{\LSDwrapfigLabel}%
  \endcenter%
  \endwrapfigure%
  \LSDwrapfig{}{}{}%
}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%% begin document %%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{document}

\hypersetup{pageanchor=false}

\begin{titlepage}
\vspace*{7cm}
\begin{center}
{\Large $projectname $projectnumber}\\
\vspace*{1cm}
{\large Generated by Doxygen $doxygenversion}\\
\vspace*{0.5cm}
{\small $datetime}\\
\end{center}
\end{titlepage}

\pagenumbering{roman}
\tableofcontents
\listoffigures

\pagenumbering{arabic}
\hypersetup{pageanchor=true}
